full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` 'PHAGS PA 'JAM DBYANGS NAG PO'I SGRUB THABS NYUNG DU RNAM GSAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES 'DI PAS NAG PO'I BSGRUB THABS NYUNG DU RNAM GSAL 'DI NI, DAD PA RNAM DPYOD KYIS MOS PA'I, DPON MOS SANGS RGYAS SGROL MA'I ZHAL DON DU, DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYI SBYAR BA'O, 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
